title: The Design Report
content:
Hello everyone.

Does anyone know where i can find images of past Design Report front covers - particularly the 5/02 one by Meidinger and Frutiger (the one in blue and white with a plane on it!)?

Thank you!

 [‹ Political Graphic Design](http://web.archive.org/web/20080228043256/http:/www.typophile.com/node/42455 "Go to previous forum topic") [Sans with Swash ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080228043256/http:/www.typophile.com/node/42274 "Go to next forum topic")
author: Will Stanford

comments.content:
Thanks sil,

I was really looking for one with a higher resolution to allow for decent reproduction.  
Any ideas?

Wil
